committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the inclusion of certain additional lands within the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore.

summary.text: Includes specified lands at the mouth of Chequamegon Bay, Wisconsin, known as Long Island, within the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the inclusion of certain additional lands within the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore.
